description.default: A cramped, dank dormitory carved directly into the sewer walls. Hammocks strung from rusted chains fill the room, most occupied by sleeping figures who keep their weapons close. The air is thick with the smell of unwashed bodies and damp stone. A rough archway leads OUT to the guild hub.

objects.name: hammock
objects.description: A filthy canvas hammock strung from rusted chains.

hidden_objects.name: a scrawled note
hidden_objects.description: A piece of parchment nailed to a post with a dagger.

description.default: The beating heart of the city's criminal underbelly. Torches burn with a smokeless, magical grey fire, illuminating a large natural cavern. Thieves, smugglers, and outcasts of all races mingle here, trading secrets and stolen goods. A large tunnel leads UP towards the sewers, and a rough archway leads back to the hostel.

objects.name: a guild master
objects.description: A shadowy figure in dark leather armor, watching the room with calculating eyes.

name: The Bottom of a Sewage Cistern

description.default: It is dark and cramped down here. The air is foul and smells of sewage. Dark passages lead east and west. A hidden grate leads DOWN to the guild hub. A rusted iron ladder leads UP to the surface.

objects.name: iron ladder
objects.description: A rusted iron ladder leads back up to a dark alley in Aethel's Crossing.

objects.name: grate
objects.description: A heavy iron grate covering a hole in the floor. It looks like it can be opened.

description.default: The damp, foul smell from the cistern intensifies here. The darkness is oppressive, and you hear a faint skittering noise from deeper in.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: You wade through knee-deep, foul-smelling water. The tunnel, built of ancient, crumbling brick, continues north. The main cistern is to the south.

objects.name: murky water
objects.description: Filthy water flows slowly through the tunnel. You can't see the bottom.

description.default: The tunnel opens into a small, domed chamber that was once a crypt. Stone sarcophagi line the walls, their lids askew. The air is heavy with the smell of dust and decay. The only exit is the flooded tunnel to the south.

objects.name: stone sarcophagus
objects.description: An ancient stone sarcophagus. Its lid has been pushed aside, revealing only darkness within.
